info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Phone Verification Services for an account.

parameters.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the verification service. It can be up to 64 characters long. **This value should not contain PII.**
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The length of the verification code to generate. Must be an integer value between 4 and 10, inclusive.
parameters.name: CodeLength

parameters.description: Whether to perform a lookup with each verification started and return info about the phone number.
parameters.name: LookupEnabled

parameters.description: Whether to skip sending SMS verifications to landlines. Requires `lookup_enabled`.
parameters.name: SkipSmsToLandlines

parameters.description: Whether to ask the user to press a number before delivering the verify code in a phone call.
parameters.name: DtmfInputRequired

parameters.description: The name of an alternative text-to-speech service to use in phone calls. Applies only to TTS languages.
parameters.name: TtsName

parameters.description: Whether to pass PSD2 transaction parameters when starting a verification.
parameters.name: Psd2Enabled

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Messaging Configurations for a Service.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) that the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

post.description: Create a new MessagingConfiguration for a service.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) that the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The [ISO-3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code of the country this configuration will be applied to. If this is a global configuration, Country will take the value `all`.
parameters.name: Country

parameters.description: The SID of the [Messaging Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/messaging/services) to be used to send SMS to the country of this configuration.
parameters.name: MessagingServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) that the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The [ISO-3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code of the country this configuration will be applied to. If this is a global configuration, Country will take the value `all`.
parameters.name: Country

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) that the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The [ISO-3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code of the country this configuration will be applied to. If this is a global configuration, Country will take the value `all`.
parameters.name: Country

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) that the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The [ISO-3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code of the country this configuration will be applied to. If this is a global configuration, Country will take the value `all`.
parameters.name: Country

parameters.description: The SID of the [Messaging Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/messaging/services) to be used to send SMS to the country of this configuration.
parameters.name: MessagingServiceSid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Rate Limits for a service.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

post.description: Create a new Rate Limit for a Service

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Provides a unique and addressable name to be assigned to this Rate Limit, assigned by the developer, to be optionally used in addition to SID. **This value should not contain PII.**
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Description of this Rate Limit
parameters.name: Description

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Buckets for a Rate Limit.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource.
parameters.name: RateLimitSid

post.description: Create a new Bucket for a Rate Limit

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource.
parameters.name: RateLimitSid

parameters.description: Maximum number of requests permitted in during the interval.
parameters.name: Max

parameters.description: Number of seconds that the rate limit will be enforced over.
parameters.name: Interval

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource.
parameters.name: RateLimitSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Bucket.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource.
parameters.name: RateLimitSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Bucket.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource.
parameters.name: RateLimitSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Bucket.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Maximum number of requests permitted in during the interval.
parameters.name: Max

parameters.description: Number of seconds that the rate limit will be enforced over.
parameters.name: Interval

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api-beta/service-beta) the resource is associated with.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Rate Limit resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Description of this Rate Limit
parameters.name: Description

parameters.description: The SID of the verification [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/services) to create the resource under.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The 4-10 character string being verified.
parameters.name: Code

parameters.description: The phone number to verify. Either this parameter or the `verification_sid` must be specified
parameters.name: To

parameters.description: A SID that uniquely identifies the Verification Check. Either this parameter or the `to` phone number must be specified.
parameters.name: VerificationSid

parameters.description: The amount of the associated PSD2 compliant transaction. Requires the PSD2 Service flag enabled.
parameters.name: Amount

parameters.description: The payee of the associated PSD2 compliant transaction. Requires the PSD2 Service flag enabled.
parameters.name: Payee

post.description: Create a new Verification for a To number using a Service

parameters.description: The SID of the verification [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/services) to create the resource under.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The phone number to verify.
parameters.name: To

parameters.description: The verification method to use. Can be: `sms` or `call`.
parameters.name: Channel

parameters.description: The text of a custom message to use for the verification.
parameters.name: CustomMessage

parameters.description: The digits to send after a phone call is answered, for example, to dial an extension. For more information, see the Programmable Voice documentation of [sendDigits](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/twiml/number#attributes-sendDigits).
parameters.name: SendDigits

parameters.description: The locale to use for the verification SMS or call. Can be: `af`, `ar`, `ca`, `cs`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `fi`, `fr`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `ko`, `ms`, `nb`, `nl`, `pl`, `pt`, `pr-BR`, `ro`, `ru`, `sv`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`, `vi`, `zh`, `zh-CN`, or `zh-HK.`
parameters.name: Locale

parameters.description: A pre-generated code to use for verification. The code can be between 4 and 10 characters, inclusive.
parameters.name: CustomCode

parameters.description: The amount of the associated PSD2 compliant transaction. Requires the PSD2 Service flag enabled.
parameters.name: Amount

parameters.description: The payee of the associated PSD2 compliant transaction. Requires the PSD2 Service flag enabled.
parameters.name: Payee

parameters.description: The custom key-value pairs of Programmable Rate Limits. Keys should be the unique_name configured while creating you Rate Limit along with the associated values for each particular request. You may include multiple Rate Limit values in each request.
parameters.name: RateLimits

parameters.description: The SID of the verification [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/services) to fetch the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Verification resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the verification [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/services) to update the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Verification resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The new status of the resource. Can be: `pending`, `approved`, `denied`, or `expired`.
parameters.name: Status

delete.description: Delete a specific Verification Service Instance.

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Verification Service resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Verification Service resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

post.description: Update a specific Phone Verification Service.

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Service resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the verification service. It can be up to 64 characters long. **This value should not contain PII.**
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The length of the verification code to generate. Must be an integer value between 4 and 10, inclusive.
parameters.name: CodeLength

parameters.description: Whether to perform a lookup with each verification started and return info about the phone number.
parameters.name: LookupEnabled

parameters.description: Whether to skip sending SMS verifications to landlines. Requires `lookup_enabled`.
parameters.name: SkipSmsToLandlines

parameters.description: Whether to ask the user to press a number before delivering the verify code in a phone call.
parameters.name: DtmfInputRequired

parameters.description: The name of an alternative text-to-speech service to use in phone calls. Applies only to TTS languages.
parameters.name: TtsName

parameters.description: Whether to pass PSD2 transaction parameters when starting a verification.
parameters.name: Psd2Enabled

tags.description: PLEASE NOTE that this is a Beta product that is subject to change. Use it with caution.
tags.name: Beta
